name: In re Nomination Petition of Randolph BREWER, Candidate for Representative in the General Assembly from the 1st Legislative District. Appeal of Randolph Brewer
name_abbreviation: In re Nomination Petition of Brewer

parties: In re Nomination Petition of Randolph BREWER, Candidate for Representative in the General Assembly from the 1st Legislative District. Appeal of Randolph Brewer.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 21ST day of April, 2006, we AFFIRM the Order of the Commonwealth Court.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
895 A.2d 545
In re Nomination Petition of Randolph BREWER, Candidate for Representative in the General Assembly from the 1st Legislative District. Appeal of Randolph Brewer.
No. 6 WAP 2006.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
April 21, 2006.
